Room.Name: Glabor Gulley Southern Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are close to the western end of Glabor Gulley, on the southern path.
Room.LongDescription: There are many signs of troll activity here, and you see movement down below in the center of the gulley where there is a great circular firepit near a stone altar and a busy community area. There are several cave openings farther east on the gulley slope.
